duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Digital Workplace team in leading, managing, and conducting Project/Program kick-offs, pre-project/program planning, and managing all project/program related efforts in Smartsheet and associated productivity tools & systems.

Coordinate, report status, and ensure stability of project-related work efforts. Serve as the project POC for communications and milestones. Assure effective transition of project into deployment and production.
Perform risk assessments with project teams, identify contingency plans, and manage issues and risks proactively seeking to stay ahead of potential problems. Escalate issues and risks as appropriate.

Track key project milestones, adjust project plans and/or resources to meet the needs of the project. Forecast reporting to management as appropriate. Identify measures of project success and evaluate project through metrics.
Analyze existing procedures and identify opportunities for efficiency or improvement. Plan and direct schedules to ensure the project is completed on time and within budget.

Lead, manage, and conduct Project/Program kick-offs, pre-project/program planning and manage all project/program related efforts in Smartsheet and associated productivity tools & systems. Adapt to the many facets of Program/Project management.
Drive key decisions in alignment with project plan, SOWs, and MSAs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business or Technical (Master's preferred)
